elements.title: Cui Daozhi
elements.contents: ... that Cui Daozhi (pictured) has been called the Chinese Sherlock Holmes?

elements.title: Glossa
elements.contents: ... that "whatever the Glossa does not recognize, the court does not recognize"?

elements.title: Tommy Akingbesote
elements.contents: ... that American football players Tommy Akingbesote and Kyonte Hamilton grew up in the same community, play in the same position, and were both selected in the seventh round of the 2025 NFL draft?

elements.title: Mighty Doom
elements.contents: ... that Mighty Doom features a cartoonish aesthetic that contrasts with the dark, gritty tone of the mainline Doom series?

elements.title: Abdul Wahab Zahiri
elements.contents: ... that sprinter Abdul Wahab Zahiri made his international debut in the same year that he competed at the Olympics?

elements.title: Zofor Domri Mosque
elements.contents: ... that the 14th-century builder of Gaza's Zofor Domri Mosque was buried in the mosque?

elements.title: Ben Ahlers
elements.contents: ... that actor Ben Ahlers learned watchmaking from the Horological Society of New York for his role in The Gilded Age?

elements.title: Edison
elements.contents: ... that due to difficulty reading the biography Edison, one reviewer read it backwards?

elements.title: Horace Niall
elements.contents: ... that Horace Niall served as magistrate, defence lawyer, executioner, and coroner – for the same group of men?
